Have a go at diagnosing your own damp problems, with the help of our online damp detective - Its just for fun!

Our damp expert David Prince is on hand to help with any of your damp related problems. David is also the damp expert at Which? Magazine and is a surveyor examiner for the Property Care Association. He has over 30 years experience in the damp industry and has been involved in a number of television programmes including Room For Improvement, Location, Location, Location and Tricks of the Rogue Traders. He also provides expert advice to the Guardian Newspaper's Weekend Magazine.

Ask our experts

"Your expertise and knowledge in the area of water proofing is impressive particularly as you were able to diagnose the problem and identify a solution after discussing the matter, viewing photographs and through exchange of e-mails."

Paula, London
